title: Join my ranked team! Just friend 'Paz'
body:
Hey if you want to get season rewards with my team please be active and be up for a game!
Just friend request me or put your IGN in the comments and ill request you.

IGN: Paz
Region: OCE

Dont mind who I play with, as long as they aren't Dirt 9999

replies.body:
yo ill join bro
ogslayer gang bronze 1
